title: List of all Androidopenstreetmap   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidopenstreetmap   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: mapsforge
repoList.description: Vector map library and writer - running on Android and Desktop.
repoList.license: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

repoList.name: AndroidOfflineMapLibrary
repoList.description: Offline OpenStreet Map Library (No Internet Required) You dont have to even one-time connect!

repoList.name: timezonemap
repoList.description: Java/Kotlin library to map locations or regions to time zones

repoList.name: OpenStreetMap-Zombies
repoList.description: Android application with OSM integration trough osmdroid library

repoList.name: Osmunda
repoList.description: An offline geocode library for android, powered by SQLite, using osm data. 离线地理编码Android库，基于SQLite，使用开放街道地图数据。

repoList.name: OfflineMapFragment
repoList.description: An offline (i.e., cached) map library for Android, with retina tiles support for both Google Maps and OpenStreetMaps, simply used as a wrapper for MapFragment.
